passage_text: Tonalin, also known as Tonalin CLA, is a dietary supplement that is used for weight loss. Also, it is an exclusively licensed product of Cognis Nutrition and Health, a division of specialty chemistry company Cognis Group. The CLA suffix is an acronym for conjugated linoleic acid.

Tonalin® CLA. Reduce body fat naturally!†. Tonalin® CLA is derived by a patented process from natural safflower oil. † Experimental research indicates that CLA (Conjugated Linoleic Acid) works with your body’s enzymes involved in fat mobilization and the storage of fat. Human studies indicate that CLA can help reduce body fat mass while maintaining lean muscle.

A: Tonalin ® CLA is conjugated linoleic acid, a fatty acid known to promote optimum body composition. Tonalin ® CLA is derived in a proprietary process from natural safflower oil, a vegetarian source of linoleic acid. It is a patented product, uniquely consistent in purity and quality.

CLA is conjugated linoleic acid, which is known to improve overall body composition. Tonalin is a nutritional ingredient, sustainably sourced from natural safflower oil, a vegetarian source of linoleic acid. Safe and effective, Tonalin is the ideal way for your body to get the CLA it needs.

CLA (conjugated linoleic acid) is a type fatty acid found in small amounts in foods such as milk, cheese and red meat. Although CLA is structurally classified as an omega-6 fatty acid, it's not an essential omega-6 fatty acid.
